mapper.select: SELECT steak_id, steak_image, steak_type, steak_price, steak_details, steak_statu, type_id FROM steak WHERE steak_id=#{SteakId}
mapper.update: UPDATE steak SET steak_statu=0 WHERE steak_id=#{SteakId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO steak(steak_id, steak_image, steak_type, steak_price, steak_details, steak_statu, type_id) VALUE (#{steak.steakId}, #{steak.steakImage}, #{steak.steakType}, #{steak.steakPrice}, #{steak.steakDetails}, #{steak.steakStatu}, #{steak.typeId})
